app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps DubDub recorder
app_description: This is a simple multi recording app. Record a song you singing and sounds you playing and mix down your sound. You can export to your sound to Camera Roll as a movie and also you can import sound from movie in Camera Roll. Features: 1.Create a new record. Record sound with a microphone. Import sound from a movie in Camera Roll. Free version is up to two records. 2.Mix Record sound with a microphone for mix. Play recorded sound. Add reverb effect Play sound for mix. Send sound to another app. Save sound as a movie. 3.Copy Copy record. Mix and copy record.
